articles.description: Moments after his final sentence to prison, former Trump campaign Chairman Paul Manafort was indicted by the state of New York – a move that could potentially remove the possibility of a presidential pardon. NBC’s Ken Dilanian, MSNBC Chief Legal Correspondent…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: U.S. grounds Boeing 737 Max jets out of 'abundance of caution'
articles.description: Retired airline captain Les Abend joins Ali Velshi to talk about decision to ground the Boeing Max 8 and Max 9 models, after two deadly crashes in the span of just a few months.
